org.apache.catalina.authenticator.jaspic

类 SimpleAuthConfigProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.catalina.authenticator.jaspic.SimpleAuthConfigProvider
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    AuthConfigProvider

    public class SimpleAuthConfigProvider
extends Object
implements AuthConfigProvider
    Basic implementation primarily intended for use when using third-party ServerAuthModule implementations that only provide the module.

        public ClientAuthConfig getClientAuthConfig(String layer,
